title: Expo 2020
text:
travel resume 
Dream Come True 
Progress is a never ending process. A nation which desires to lead and want progress needs to change constantly with new developments taking drastic steps where necessary. A dynamic city like Dubai is in a process of constant development with the great vision of his highness Sheikh Muhammad. Winning of expo 2020 is a well-deserved success Dubai has got. Despite being a great honor, it’s more of a great responsibility for Dubai, trusting its history and caliber of making great things happen. 
Wining expo 2020 is a significant mark on Dubai’s timeline to become the world’s tourist and economic hub. The trophy didn’t come alone, along came great responsibility. The victory has put Dubai’s reputation at stake. Fortunately the rulers have it all sorted out. Several multibillion dirham projects are either proposed or are pacing toward their conclusion. With these mega developments the Dubai authorities plan to astound or rather stun the expo 2020 visitors and the world. Mainly these developments feature luxury hotels, lavish residential buildings villas etc., malls entertainment and amusement facilities and much more. Muhammad bin Rashid city 
A new mega development in this regard named Muhammad bin Rashid city is progressing towards completion. This venture is planned in four phases, first one emphasizes on family tourism with a state of the art park designed to receive 35 million visitors and to accommodate those visitors 100 hotels. Second phase is meant for the world’s largest mall and the third one to accommodate world’s largest art gallery. The fourth phase is ought to attract investors to the region to promote entrepreneurial environment in the region. A subsidiary of this project is district one featuring top notch luxury villas and a ginormous water park. 
Blue Waters Island 
Another major development concerning the expo 2020 is the blue waters island that when completed will provide an optimal environment for retail, residence and entertainment. This island will also hold Dubai eye, the world’s largest Ferris wheel. The project is being built near Jumeirah Beach Residence with Meraas Holdings being the developer. Taj Dubai 
Replicating India’s Taj Mahal, Taj Dubai stands significant among the expo 2020 developments. Made out of glass this hotel will contain 350 hotel rooms and serviced apartments. Another leisure and entertainment facility named Dubai adventure studios is being constructed. This establishment will basically feature theme parks themed with Hollywood’s famous movies. This place is meant to be the ultimate destination for family entertainment. 
Dubai Water Canal 
Last but not the least is the Dubai water canal, extending 6 km into Dubai’s waterfront this waterway will be lined with hotels and trade centers and other public places and crossed by state of the art bridges. 
These developments ensure a great hosting of tourist and visitors of Expo 2020. Along with that they have great impact on Dubai’s economy creating countless opportunities in terms of jobs and investments. 
The construction and property section is getting the maximum benefits of this scenario and the developments ensure value increase of property situated around it. As per investment experts, this is the best time to invest in property.
